db:info.db:title: Wayland Text Input Protocol, version unstable v2
db:info.db:edition: Qt Wayland Compositor | Commercial or GPLv3

db:article.db:para: Adds support for text input and input methods to applications.
Used in the Qt Wayland Compositor, and the Qt Wayland platform plugin.
The sources can be found in qtwayland/src/3rdparty/protocol/text-input-unstable-v2.xml.
